content: What 1999 film features an office worker who forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman?

The 1999 film you're referring to is "Fight Club," directed by David Fincher and based on the novel of the same name by Chuck Palahniuk. The main character, played by Brad Pitt, is a soap salesman who forms an underground fight club with Tyler Durden, portrayed by Edward Norton, who is an office worker. The film explores themes of consumerism, masculinity, and identity in a dark and thought-provoking manner.
